phase.text: Whew! I thought you might be one of them!

userResponse.option: I think they've gone now...but they won't be far.

phase.text: It's me, Ink! Please don't hurt me!

userResponse.option: Don't be afraid. I'm an SWS agent!

phase.text: In that case...what can I do for you?

userResponse.option: The intruders have taken a portrait from the Gallery. You don’t know what they did with it, do you?

phase.text: Oh yes! I think I saw those horrible rascals carry it through here!

userResponse.option: Where did they go with it?

phase.text: They disappeared through the fireplace! But then one of them came back out and... (gulp) I saw him EAT the portrait!

userResponse.option: What! They must have destroyed it after they found whatever secret it contained. Now the secret might be lost forever!

phase.text: If you could tell me whose portrait it was, I may be able to find a book that could help you!

userResponse.option: Brilliant! I'll take a look. This could really be helpful!

phase.text: Slosh was a clever old chap, and he loved secrets and puzzles! Trust uncle Slosh to leave a riddle behind!

userResponse.option: You've been a great help, Ink. Thanks!

phase.text: Best get to work! Good luck!
